amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to prohibit the Federal Communications Committee from finalizing the proposed rule "Universal Service Contribution Methodology," which would impose a cap on the Universal Service Fund and allow the sub-caps of USF programs to be combined.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Pocan.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pocan amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
